import sys
from datetime import datetime, timezone
sys.path.insert(0, ''.'')

from src.halcytone_content_generator.schemas.content_types import SessionContentStrict
from src.halcytone_content_generator.services.session_summary_generator import SessionSummaryGenerator

# Create session
session = SessionContentStrict(
    title=''Evening Relaxation Session'',
    content=''Deep relaxation breathing techniques for stress relief'',
    session_id=''test-002'',
    session_duration=2400,  # 40 minutes
    participant_count=18,
    breathing_techniques=[''Coherent Breathing'', ''Belly Breathing''],
    average_hrv_improvement=18.5,
    key_achievements=[''Perfect group synchronization'', ''Zero dropouts''],
    session_type=''guided'',
    session_date=datetime.now(timezone.utc),
    published=True
)

# Generate summary
generator = SessionSummaryGenerator()
summary = generator.generate_session_summary(session, [''email'', ''web''])

print(''Session summary generated!'')
print(f''Email subject: {summary[""email""][""subject""]}'')
print(f''Web slug: {summary[""web""][""slug""]}'')
print(f''Metadata: Featured={summary[""metadata""][""featured""]}, Priority={summary[""metadata""][""priority""]}'')
")
